function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure of frontline health care practitioners to contagious pathogens through direct patient contact.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for health care practitioners and potential spread of contagious diseases within healthcare facilities.","Mitigation":"Implement strict infection control measures, provide adequate personal protective equipment, and prioritize testing and vaccination of health care practitioners.","Technologies":"Telemedicine, decontamination robots, and autonomous disinfection systems.","People":"Frontline health care practitioners, patients, and visitors in healthcare facilities.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health agencies, and facility management."},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on manufacturing and socioeconomic functions, leading to increased need for remote operation and maintenance.","Impact":"Disruption of manufacturing, economic activities, and critical infrastructure, with potential impact on public health and safety.","Mitigation":"Invest in research and development of remote operation technologies, implement teleoperation systems, and enhance cybersecurity measures for remote-controlled facilities.","Technologies":"Remote operation systems, teleoperation platforms, and cybersecurity solutions for critical infrastructure.","People":"Manufacturing workers, facility operators, and essential service workers.","Owner":"Manufacturing companies, infrastructure operators, and government agencies."}]}
